Articles.Content: Would it be possible to include current AP/PE values to normal game view? It would be great to see them without need of switching to map view. Mods can be used, but this should be included in the main game interface and also cabin view.
Even better: Make information like this available when there is a sufficiently skilled Kerbal (or probe core) on board. It would make engineers a lot more useful during flight.

[quote name='Tex_NL']Even better: Make information like this available when there is a sufficiently skilled Kerbal (or probe core) on board. It would make engineers a lot more useful during flight.[/QUOTE]

Your definition of "even better" if very different from mine. You want to be able to see if from Map view but only on the main screen with a sufficient engineer? That makes absolutely no sense at all.
I meant it as an additional information source with things like Ap, Pe, dV, etc.
I think a pilot would be more skilled to calculate those things than an engineer.
I think it does not matter who flies. Until there will be complete ship control in map view it is necessary to have this in normal window. Even when sond is launched.
